UsageSpecCharacteristicValue.description: A value that can be assigned to a UsageSpecCharacteristic.

default.description: If true, this is the default value for a characteristic

value.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the usage specification characteristic is

valueFrom.description: The low range value that a characteristic can take on

valueTo.description: The upper range value that a characteristic can take on

valueType.description: A kind of value that the characteristic can take on, such as numeric, text
